#----------------------------------PLEASE NOTE---------------------------------#
#This file is the author's own work and represents their interpretation of the #
#song. You may only use this file for private study, scholarship, or research. #
#------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
#
Hola, esto ye, creo, el primer canciu folk asturianu que se pon
per equi'. (Teniendo'n cuenta que grupos espa~oles tampocu ye qu'haya
munchos).
        Ye de Llan de Cubel, Llonxana, del IV (ya u'ltimu) lo que pongo.

        -----------------------

        Llonxana
        --------
        LLAN DE CUBEL

        Afinacio'n en Eb (Cejilla)
        (Tunning [ch]Eb[/ch])

        [ch]C[/ch] % [ch]D[/ch] % [ch]C[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] - [ch]G[/ch] % [ch]C[/ch] % [ch]G[/ch] % [ch]D[/ch] % % (x2)

        [ch]G[/ch] % [ch]D[/ch] % [ch]G[/ch] % [ch]C[/ch] % [ch]G[/ch] % [ch]D[/ch] % [ch]G[/ch] % [ch]C[/ch] % (x2)

        Esto to'case no como simples acordes, sino a golpes,
        coincidiendo con los acentos. Si escucha'is el
        discu entendere'islu.

                    [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
        Que' ya nun podemos tar

               [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]
        oyendo la mesma agua

                   [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
        del rullar de cada d?a:

                [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
        va'senos ensin palabra,


                 [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]
        tuya y m?a, cada instante

                [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]
        como pa'xaru qu'esnala

                 [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]
        ensin un cantar d'azul

                [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]
        nomeolvides, ensin nada

        Pie:                 [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]
                Yes pa mi'os oyos tan tuyos

                       [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]
                amante llume llonxana:

                           [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
                fueu de besar perselino

                       [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
                y se~arda' que me llama

        que seya un netu gociar
        los sabores de mazana...
        Que l'amor de l'alta nueche
        tien la ma's dulce alborada.

        Que ya nun podemos tar,
        ya que puede la distancia
        ma's que los sua~os de dos
        sua~ando la mesma agua

        * Pie *
        * Pie *

        Seliqui'n hasta'l final.

        ---------------------------------------------
        % - Repeticio'n

        En realida' esto ta toca'o con afinacio'n abierta,
        pero pue' tocase col'afinacio'n normal (subida un tono
        cola cejilla:Eb). Anque nun sepas cola afinacio'n abierta,
        pruebla, ye fa'cil deprender 4 acordes y suenen mui bien.

                                       [ch]E[/ch]   [ch]A[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]B[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch]
Los acordes en                         |   | | | |   |
Afinacio'n Abierta, Open D tuning:   ( D-- A D G A-- D-- )
=======================================================================

       [ch]D[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]Em[/ch]
 1 D---0---------0---------2---------2---------|
 2 A---0---------2---------3---------2---------|
 3 G---2---------0---------0---------0---------|
 4 D---4---------0---------2---------2---------|
 5 A--(5)--------2---------3---------2---------|
 6 D---0---------x---------x---------2---------|
                (0)       (0)       (0)

        Si toques G, Em y C cola cuerda 6 a l'aire, faes el baxu'n
        [ch]D[/ch].
=======================================================================

        Si quere'is preguntaime daque':

        fERNANDO fELIX gUTIERREZ bLANCO
        xIXON, pRINCIPAU D'aSTURIES. eSPA~A
        e-mAIL: f2n2295@pinon.ccu.uniovi.es

From: wvaughan@magnus.acs.ohio-state.edu (William Vaughan)
Date: 28 Jul 1995 20:37:34 GMT
Subject: CRD and TAB Lloyd Cole's "Rattlesnakes"

Here's Lloyd Cole's Rattlesnakes - fairly easy song.  The riff
I've tabbed out is repeated during the verses and when the slide
from the B to C# occurs, make the E(022100) an E6 (022120).  Also
the violin solo hasn't been tabbed, but its really easy - mess
around in the proper key and you'll find it no problem.

Opening and verse riff

I-----------------------I-------------------------|I
I-----------------------I-------------------------|I
I-----------------------I-------------------------|I  D   Dsus2
I------------------0----I------------------0------|I
I------2--sl---4--------I-------2--sl---4---------|I
I--0--------------------I----0--------------------|I


riff again, except no Dsus2

[ch]D[/ch]                        [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]Dsus4[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]Dsus4[/ch]

[ch]E[/ch]           [ch]Bm[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]A[/ch]

*verse pattern twice*
She's less than sure if her
Heart has come to stay in san jose

As she tries her luck with the traffic police

*Chorus again*
